results.title: I know a secret
results.creator_credit: Bruce Pittman, Janice Platt, Michael Macmillan, Seaton McLean and Atlantis Films
results.brief_description: A film adaptation of a short story by Lucy Maud Montgomery set during a period in the late 1930’s. The story is about a young girl, called Lane Lawrence, and some children she becomes acquainted with after she moves to the country with her mother to live.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Bruce Pittman, Janice Platt, Michael Macmillan, Seaton McLean and Atlantis Films

results.title: The Crucible
results.creator_credit: Nicholas Hytner, David V. Picker, Robert Miller and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description: She afflicts me! She comes to me at night and torments me! She’s a witch! In the Puritan village of Salem Massachusetts in 1692, these words provoked fear and terror in the hearts of the townspeople. Behind these accusations lie the covenance of a neighbours land and a girl who will stop at nothing to capture the heart of a married man. This screenplay is penned by Arthur Miller and based on his play of the same name. He skillfully recreates a real-life story, combining intrigue, romance and suspense of the infamous Salem Witch Trials. Cast includes Daniel Day-Lewis, Winona Ryder, Paul Scofield, Joan Allen, Bruce Davidson, Rob Campbell and Jeffrey Jones. A study guide accompanies this tape.

results.title: Japan: an historical overview [B&W]
results.brief_description: The major events in Japan’s long history, from the clan society of about 800BC to today’s parliamentary government. The influence of Buddhism and other cultural elements from Asia; the impact of Western technology; and how the shifting powers of priests, nobles, Shogun and Emperor have affected the destiny of this vigorous island nation.

results.title: Seven (Captioned) (D)
results.creator_credit: David Fincher, Arnold Kopelson, Phyllis Carlyle and New Line Cinema
results.brief_description: A serial killer is murdering people according to a deranged righteous rationale, punishing people for their indulgence in the seven deadly sins. Morgan Freeman is Detective Somerset, a police officer who has seen too much crime and has witnessed for too long the savagery of a decaying urban world. Brad Pitt is young Detective Mills, eager to prove his abilities and excited to have landed a fascinating if gruesome case. “Seven” is a film that portrays an almost misanthropic contempt for the contemporary world; a world in which spirituality is infused with vengeance and where relationships are tainted by exploitation. The nameless city is always dark and wet, and begins to resemble a vision of Hell. “Seven” includes stunning photography, electrifying editing and a meticulous soundtrack. The film confronts the viewer with the hateful extremeties of evil. It remains unforgettable because it also suggests that evil is not the prerogative of monsters. Co-starring Gwyneth Paltrow and a diabolically good Kevin Spacey. Do not miss the opening credit sequence.

results.title: Benji's very own Christmas story
results.brief_description: Another story featuring Benji, the canine star of ‘Benji’ and ‘Benji the hunted’. In this adventure, set during Christmas, Benji ventures to the land of Kris Kringle (Santa Clause) where he discovers a secret that could break the hearts of millions of kids. With Benji’s help however, Kris discovers what real love is all about. Created, produced and directed by Joe Camp.

results.title: Benji
results.brief_description: The first of the successful series featuring Benji, told from the point of view of the dog. An entertaining movie that will be enjoyed by the whole family. Created, produced and directed by Joe Camp.

results.title: Flower stories
results.creator_credit: Kate Canning, Terry Harding, HTV West, Richard Price Television and Taurus-Film
results.brief_description: A compilation of 8 animated stories aimed to entertain children aged between 3-9 years and featuring James, a fat black and white cat. The central theme for all the stories is “flowers”. Very colorful! Animation by Sue Allen. Storyteller: Alan Taylor.

results.title: The Great Muppet caper
results.creator_credit: Jim Henson, David Lazer, Frank Oz and ITC Entertainment
results.brief_description: Kermit and Fozzie Bear star as twin reporters, who together with the rest of the Muppet gang travel to Great Britain in search of jewel thieves. Catching the guilty culprits seems to be the only action to redeem themselves with their boss for letting the thieves escape under their very noses. During their stay Kermit meets Miss Piggy posing as fashion designer Lady Holiday (Diana Rigg), the woman whose gems have been stolen. While the Muppets are in Britain another of Lady Holiday’s diamonds is stolen and Miss Piggy is arrested on suspicion of theft. Now there is even more at stake than their jobs as the Muppets race to clear Miss Piggy’s name and stop another theft from occurring. Features cameos by Peter Falk, John Cleese, Peter Ustinov and others.

results.title: Night sun = Il sole anche di notte
results.creator_credit: Paolo Taviani, Vittorio Taviani, Guiliani de Negri and Filmtre
results.brief_description: Based on Tolstoy’s short story “Father Sergius”, the Taviani brother’s “Night Sun” is a brooding portrait of one man’s search for truth. Baron Sergio Giuramondo (Julian Sands)is set for a comfortable life in the kings court when he discovers that the woman he is about to marry is the king’s mistress. He joins the priesthood, eventually becoming a monk with a growing reputation for saintliness. “Night Sun” is a beautiful film to watch, with plenty of lush italian palazzi settings and rural vistas of. Julian Sands is mesmerising as the tortured Father Sergius. In Italian with English subtitles.

results.title: Back to the future
results.creator_credit: Robert Zemeckis, Bob Gale, Neil Canton and Amblin Entertainment
results.brief_description: Marty McFly (Michael J Fox) and Doc (Christopher Lloyd) have to save the present by going back to the future in this classic from the 1980s.

constellations_other.name: Obviously the time continuum has been disrupted...again and again and again!
constellations_other.description: Eadweard Muybridge was able to capture time and play it back again creating endless time paradoxes where subjects are destined to repeat their previous actions. Filmmakers have since explored such notions via time travel narratives questioning destiny, fate and choice.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Robert Zemeckis, Bob Gale, Neil Canton and Amblin Entertainment
results.description: Michael J. Fox stars as Marty McFly, transported by his friend Doc’s time machine to 1955. Marty rubs shoulders with a much younger version of his parents and sees a side to them he never knew existed. The only problem is that the car responsible for sending him back to 1955 has run out of the plutonium required to fuel the car. Marty must convince Doc that his idea for a time machine, conceived in 1955 was a reality in the 1980s. As a further complication, Marty must ensure his parents-to-be meet and fall in love.
